languages.text: "Ну, как же! Стоило вам взойти на корабль, как сгинули Леди Теодора, архмилитант, половина старших офицеров и четверть Гильдии Инфернус с Инфернус-мастером. А заодно пайки на вкус другие стали, и пламя злее шпарит, и взгляд у вас {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}мрачный{/d} — того и гляди сглазите!" {n}Монтэг весело улыбается.{/n} "Так в экипаже говорят, а пустотники врать не станут".

"Do I even need to say it? The moment you came aboard, Lady Theodora perished. So did her Arch-Militant, as well as half of the senior officers and a quarter of the Infernus Guild along with the previous Infernus Master. What's worse: rations don't taste as good anymore, fire burns hotter, and that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}sinister{/d} look in your eyes — like you're about to put a curse on someone!" {n}Einrich grins.{/n} "It's what the voidsmen say, so it must be true."
languages.original_text: "Ну, как же! Стоило вам взойти на корабль, как сгинули Леди Теодора, архмилитант, половина старших офицеров и четверть Гильдии Инфернус с Инфернус-мастером. А заодно пайки на вкус другие стали, и пламя злее шпарит, и взгляд у вас {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}мрачный{/d} — того и гляди сглазите!" {n}Монтэг весело улыбается.{/n} "Так в экипаже говорят, а пустотники врать не станут".

The moment you came aboard, Lady Theodora perished, so did her Arch-Militant, and so did half of the senior officers and a quarter of the Infernus Guild along with the previous Infernus Master. What's worse, rations don't taste as good anymore, fire burns hotter, and that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}sinister{/d} look in your eyes — like you're about to put a curse on someone!" {n}Einrich grins.{/n} "It's what the voidsmen say, so it must be true."

"Do I even need to say it? The moment you came aboard, Lady Theodora perished. So did her Arch-Militant, as well as half of the senior officers and a quarter of the Infernus Guild along with the previous Infernus Master. What's worse: rations don't taste as good anymore, fire burns hotter, and that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}sinister{/d} look in your eyes — like you're about to put a curse on someone!" {n}Einrich grins.{/n} "It's what the voidsmen say, so it must be true."

"Do I even need to say it? The moment you came aboard, Lady Theodora perished. So did her Arch-Militant, as well as half of the senior officers and a quarter of the Infernus Guild along with the previous Infernus Master. What's worse: rations don't taste as good anymore, fire burns hotter, and that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}sinister{/d} look in your eyes — like you're about to put a curse on someone!" {n}Einrich grins.{/n} "It's what the voidsmen say, so it must be true."

languages.text: "Muss ich das überhaupt sagen? Als Ihr an Bord kamt, starb Lady Theodora. Genauso wie ihr Erzmilitant, die Hälfte der leitenden Offiziere, ein Viertel der Infernus-Gilde und der vorherige Infernus-Meister. Aber es kommt noch schlimmer: Die Rationen schmecken nicht mehr wie früher, das Feuer brennt heißer und dieser {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}unheimliche{/d} Ausdruck in Euren Augen .... als würdet Ihr gleich jemanden verfluchen!" {n}Einrich grinst.{/n} "Das sagen die Raumfahrer, also muss es wahr sein."
languages.original_text: "Do I even need to say it? The moment you came aboard, Lady Theodora perished. So did her Arch-Militant, as well as half of the senior officers and a quarter of the Infernus Guild along with the previous Infernus Master. What's worse: rations don't taste as good anymore, fire burns hotter, and that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}sinister{/d} look in your eyes — like you're about to put a curse on someone!" {n}Einrich grins.{/n} "It's what the voidsmen say, so it must be true."

traits.locale_text: "Muss ich das überhaupt sagen? Als Ihr an Bord kamt, starb Lady Theodora. Genauso wie ihr Erzmilitant, die Hälfte der leitenden Offiziere, ein Viertel der Infernus-Gilde und der vorherige Infernus-Meister. Aber es kommt noch schlimmer: Die Rationen schmecken nicht mehr wie früher, das Feuer brennt heißer und dieser {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}unheimliche{/d} Ausdruck in Euren Augen .... als würdet Ihr gleich jemanden verfluchen!" {n}Einrich grinst.{/n} "Das sagen die Raumfahrer, also muss es wahr sein."

languages.text: « Ai-je vraiment besoin de le préciser ? Dame Théodora est morte à l'instant précis où vous avez mis les pieds à bord. Même combat pour son archimilitant, la moitié des officiers supérieurs et un bon quart de la guilde infernus, y compris son précédent maître. Pire encore, la qualité des rations a baissé, le feu brûle plus fort et je ne vous parle même pas de cette lueur {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}sinistre{/d} dans votre regard... On croirait que vous êtes sur le point de maudire quelqu'un ! » {n}Einrich esquisse un sourire en coin.{/n} « C'est ce que racontent les cosmomarins, alors ce doit être vrai. »
languages.original_text: "Do I even need to say it? The moment you came aboard, Lady Theodora perished. So did her Arch-Militant, as well as half of the senior officers and a quarter of the Infernus Guild along with the previous Infernus Master. What's worse: rations don't taste as good anymore, fire burns hotter, and that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}sinister{/d} look in your eyes — like you're about to put a curse on someone!" {n}Einrich grins.{/n} "It's what the voidsmen say, so it must be true."

traits.locale_text: « Ai-je vraiment besoin de le préciser ? Dame Théodora est morte à l'instant précis où vous avez mis les pieds à bord. Même combat pour son archimilitant, la moitié des officiers supérieurs et un bon quart de la guilde infernus, y compris son précédent maître. Pire encore, la qualité des rations a baissé, le feu brûle plus fort et je ne vous parle même pas de cette lueur {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}sinistre{/d} dans votre regard... On croirait que vous êtes sur le point de maudire quelqu'un ! » {n}Einrich esquisse un sourire en coin.{/n} « C'est ce que racontent les cosmomarins, alors ce doit être vrai. »

languages.text: «¿Hace falta decirlo siquiera? Al poco de subir usted a bordo, lady Theodora pereció junto con su archimilitante, la mitad de los oficiales veteranos y una cuarta parte del gremio de infernus, incluido el anterior maestro de infernus. Y lo que es aún peor: las raciones ya no saben tan bien como antes, el fuego quema más que nunca, y esa expresión tan {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}siniestra{/d} que tiene siempre... ¡como si estuviese a punto de echarle una maldición a alguien!». {n}Einrich hace una mueca.{/n} «Eso es lo que dicen los infantes del vacío, así que debe de ser cierto».
languages.original_text: "Do I even need to say it? The moment you came aboard, Lady Theodora perished. So did her Arch-Militant, as well as half of the senior officers and a quarter of the Infernus Guild along with the previous Infernus Master. What's worse: rations don't taste as good anymore, fire burns hotter, and that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}sinister{/d} look in your eyes — like you're about to put a curse on someone!" {n}Einrich grins.{/n} "It's what the voidsmen say, so it must be true."

traits.locale_text: «¿Hace falta decirlo siquiera? Al poco de subir usted a bordo, lady Theodora pereció junto con su archimilitante, la mitad de los oficiales veteranos y una cuarta parte del gremio de infernus, incluido el anterior maestro de infernus. Y lo que es aún peor: las raciones ya no saben tan bien como antes, el fuego quema más que nunca, y esa expresión tan {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}siniestra{/d} que tiene siempre... ¡como si estuviese a punto de echarle una maldición a alguien!». {n}Einrich hace una mueca.{/n} «Eso es lo que dicen los infantes del vacío, así que debe de ser cierto».

languages.text: 「言うまでもないでしょう？あなたが乗船された瞬間、シオドーラ様はお亡くなりになりました。あの方のアーク・ミリタントも、上級士官の半数も、インフェルヌス・ギルドの4分の1も、善人のインフェルヌス・マスターも。さらに悪いことに、配給はおいしくなくなり、火はさらに高温で燃え、あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}邪悪な{/d}目つきは…まるで誰かを呪おうとでもしているかのようだ！」{n}アインリッヒがニヤリと笑う。{/n}「これがヴォイズマンが言っていることです。きっと事実なのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Do I even need to say it? The moment you came aboard, Lady Theodora perished. So did her Arch-Militant, as well as half of the senior officers and a quarter of the Infernus Guild along with the previous Infernus Master. What's worse: rations don't taste as good anymore, fire burns hotter, and that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}sinister{/d} look in your eyes — like you're about to put a curse on someone!" {n}Einrich grins.{/n} "It's what the voidsmen say, so it must be true."

traits.locale_text: 「言うまでもないでしょう？あなたが乗船された瞬間、シオドーラ様はお亡くなりになりました。あの方のアーク・ミリタントも、上級士官の半数も、インフェルヌス・ギルドの4分の1も、善人のインフェルヌス・マスターも。さらに悪いことに、配給はおいしくなくなり、火はさらに高温で燃え、あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}邪悪な{/d}目つきは…まるで誰かを呪おうとでもしているかのようだ！」{n}アインリッヒがニヤリと笑う。{/n}「これがヴォイズマンが言っていることです。きっと事実なのでしょう」

languages.text: “这还用我多解释吗？您上船之后没多久，西奥多拉夫人就死了。她的首席战士，一半的高阶军官，以及控火行会四分之一的成员，还有前任控火大师全都死了。更糟糕的是，口粮不像以前那么好吃了，火变得更烫人了，还有您眼中那{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}邪恶{/d}的神色，就好像您要诅咒别人一样！”{n}艾因里奇咧开嘴，笑了起来。{/n}“大家都是这么说的，所以这肯定是真的。”
languages.original_text: "Do I even need to say it? The moment you came aboard, Lady Theodora perished. So did her Arch-Militant, as well as half of the senior officers and a quarter of the Infernus Guild along with the previous Infernus Master. What's worse: rations don't taste as good anymore, fire burns hotter, and that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}sinister{/d} look in your eyes — like you're about to put a curse on someone!" {n}Einrich grins.{/n} "It's what the voidsmen say, so it must be true."

traits.locale_text: “这还用我多解释吗？您上船之后没多久，西奥多拉夫人就死了。她的首席战士，一半的高阶军官，以及控火行会四分之一的成员，还有前任控火大师全都死了。更糟糕的是，口粮不像以前那么好吃了，火变得更烫人了，还有您眼中那{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}邪恶{/d}的神色，就好像您要诅咒别人一样！”{n}艾因里奇咧开嘴，笑了起来。{/n}“大家都是这么说的，所以这肯定是真的。”

languages.text: "Dile getirmeme gerek var mı gerçekten? Gemiye adım attığınız anda Leydi Theodora vefat etti. Başmilitan'ı, kıdemli subayları, İtfa Loncası'nın dörtte biri ve önceki İtfa Üstadı da aynı şekilde. Daha da kötüsü: Kumanyaların tadı artık eskisi kadar güzel değil, ateşler daha hararetli yanıyor ve gözlerinizdeki bu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}şeytani{/d} bakışlar ile sanki birini lanetlemek üzereymiş gibi duruyorsunuz!" {n}Einrich sırıtıyor.{/n} "Uçsuz erleri böyle söylüyor, demek ki doğru."
languages.original_text: "Do I even need to say it? The moment you came aboard, Lady Theodora perished. So did her Arch-Militant, as well as half of the senior officers and a quarter of the Infernus Guild along with the previous Infernus Master. What's worse: rations don't taste as good anymore, fire burns hotter, and that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}sinister{/d} look in your eyes — like you're about to put a curse on someone!" {n}Einrich grins.{/n} "It's what the voidsmen say, so it must be true."
